model.common

Class ModelFacade

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.common.ModelFacade

  • public class ModelFacade
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is the controller for the complicated actions to be done with the model data. Here is where you can do all of your adding, deleting, moving etc...
